modules.description: Gear up with your TON wallet

slides.title: Welcome to the Kit Bag
slides.body: Hey Future Analyst! Before you step onto the pitch to trade predictions, you need your gear.

slides.title: Why Do I Need It?
slides.body: Unlike a bank that holds your money, a Wallet lets YOU hold your money.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Who controls your crypto wallet?
slides.explanation: That's right! With a crypto wallet, YOU are in control of your funds. No bank or app developer can freeze or take your money.

slides.title: Your Jersey Number
slides.body: We use TON wallets here. Think of your TON Wallet address like your Jersey Number.

slides.title: Let's Suit Up!
slides.instruction: Connect your TON wallet now to finish this Over.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You've got your kit ready! You're now equipped to step onto the pitch.

slides.title: The Ticket & The Score
slides.body: In cricket, you need a ticket to enter the stadium, and the scoreboard tracks the runs. In crypto, TON is your ticket and USDT keeps the score!

slides.title: TON: Your Match Ticket
slides.body: TON is the native currency of The Open Network. Think of it like your match ticket - its price can go up or down based on demand, just like ticket prices before a big final!

slides.title: USDT: The Scoreboard
slides.body: USDT (Tether) is a stablecoin pegged to the US Dollar. 1 USDT = $1, always. It's like the scoreboard - reliable and steady. Perfect for keeping your winnings safe.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Which one stays stable in value?
slides.explanation: Correct! USDT is a stablecoin - it's designed to always equal $1. TON's price moves up and down like any other cryptocurrency.

slides.title: When to Use Each
slides.body: Use TON to pay for transactions (gas fees) and when you believe the price will rise. Use USDT to lock in your profits and protect against price swings.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: You just won big! What's the smartest move to protect your gains?
slides.explanation: Smart thinking! Converting some winnings to USDT locks in your gains. If TON drops, your USDT stays safe at $1.

slides.title: The Winning Combo
slides.body: Pro analysts use both: TON for upside potential and transaction fees, USDT for stability and protecting profits. Balance is key!

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You now understand the two key currencies! You're ready to manage your portfolio like a pro analyst.

modules.title: The Analyst vs. The Impulse Trader

slides.title: The Analyst vs. The Impulse Trader
slides.body: Two traders watch the same market. One trades on gut feeling, the other studies the data. Same opportunity, very different outcomes. Which one are you?

slides.title: The Impulse Trader's Mindset
slides.body: Impulse traders chase hype. They go all-in on hunches, overreact to losses, and let emotions drive decisions. It's exciting... until their capital runs out.

slides.title: The Analyst's Mindset
slides.body: Analysts study the pitch, check player form, consider weather conditions. They make calculated decisions based on data, not hope. Boring? Maybe. Profitable? Usually.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Your favorite team is playing. An analyst would:

options.text: Go all-in on them to win

slides.explanation: Exactly! Analysts remove emotion and check the data. Your favorite team might be in poor form - a true analyst acknowledges that.

slides.title: Rule #1: Protect Your Capital
slides.body: Only trade with money you can afford to lose. Analysts set a budget and stick to it. If a loss would hurt, you're risking too much.

slides.title: Rule #2: Small Positions, Many Markets
slides.body: Don't put all your eggs in one basket. Spread your positions across multiple matches. One bad result won't wipe you out.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: You lost 3 predictions in a row. What should you do?

options.text: Double the next position to recover
Take a break and review what went wrong

slides.explanation: Smart! Chasing losses destroys portfolios. Analysts step back, analyze their mistakes, and come back with a better strategy.

slides.title: Rule #3: Track Everything
slides.body: Keep a record of your predictions. What worked? What didn't? Patterns emerge over time. Data turns guesses into informed decisions.

slides.title: Final Check
slides.question: What separates an analyst from an impulse trader?

options.text: Analysts use data and manage risk

slides.explanation: Correct! Analysts don't always win, but they make informed decisions and protect themselves from big losses. That's the winning edge.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You've learned to think like an analyst! Remember: data over hunches, discipline over emotion. Now go make smart predictions!

slides.title: Reading the Odds
slides.body: Ever seen 'India 65% - Pakistan 35%' and wondered what it means? Time to decode the numbers that drive prediction markets!

slides.title: What Are Odds?
slides.body: Odds show what the crowd thinks will happen. If India is at 65%, most traders believe India will win. It's like a live poll of thousands of analysts.

slides.title: The Crowd vs. Reality
slides.body: Here's the secret: the crowd isn't always right! If you spot something others missed - an injury, a pitch change - you can profit when the odds catch up to reality.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: India is at 80% odds. This means:

options.text: Most traders think India will win

slides.explanation: Right! Odds reflect crowd sentiment, not certainty. Upsets happen all the time - that's what makes cricket exciting!

slides.title: Finding Value
slides.body: Value = when you think the real chance is different from the odds. If Pakistan has a 40% chance but odds show 25%, that's value! You're getting a discount.

slides.title: How Odds Move
slides.body: Odds shift as news breaks. Captain injured? Odds drop. Star player returns? Odds rise. The fastest analysts catch these moves first.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: Breaking news: India's captain is injured. What happens to India's odds?

options.text: They go up (more likely to win)
They go down (less likely to win)

slides.explanation: Correct! Bad news = lower odds. Smart analysts who see the news first can trade before the crowd reacts.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You can now read the scoreboard of prediction markets! Remember: odds are opinions, not facts. Find the gaps and profit!

slides.title: The T20 Playbook
slides.body: T20 is cricket's shortest format - fast, furious, and full of surprises. Understanding the game helps you make better predictions!

slides.title: 20 Overs, Maximum Chaos
slides.body: Each team gets just 20 overs (120 balls) to score. There's no time to play safe - batters swing hard, bowlers take risks. Anything can happen!

slides.title: The Power Play
slides.body: First 6 overs = Power Play. Fielding restrictions mean more boundaries. Teams often score 50-60 runs here. A strong Power Play can set the tone.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Why are T20 matches harder to predict than Test matches?
slides.explanation: Exactly! In T20, one dropped catch or lucky shot can swing the game. Less time = more variance = more upsets.

slides.title: Death Overs Drama
slides.body: Overs 16-20 are the 'death overs'. Teams go all out. A great death bowler or finisher can completely flip a match in the final minutes.

slides.title: Key Players to Watch
slides.body: Openers set the pace. Middle-order anchors control the chase. Death bowlers defend totals. Finishers win tight games. Know who's who!

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: Team A needs 24 runs from 6 balls. What's this called?
slides.explanation: That's the death overs! 24 from 6 is tough but not impossible in T20. One six, then another... that's the magic of T20!

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You know the T20 format! Power Plays, death overs, key players - use this knowledge to spot value others miss.

slides.title: Pitch & Weather Report
slides.body: The same two teams can have completely different results based on where they play and what the weather does. Let's decode the conditions!

slides.title: Reading the Pitch
slides.body: Green pitch = helps fast bowlers (ball swings and seams). Dry, cracked pitch = helps spinners. Flat pitch = high scores, batter's paradise.

slides.title: Home Advantage
slides.body: Teams know their home pitches. India dominates on turning tracks. Australia excels on bouncy pitches. England loves swing conditions. Location matters!

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: The pitch has visible cracks and is dry. Who benefits most?
slides.explanation: Correct! Dry, cracked pitches grip the ball and help spinners turn it sharply. Teams with strong spinners love these conditions.

slides.title: The Toss Factor
slides.body: Winning the toss can be huge! Dew at night makes batting easier. Day games might favor bowling first. Check what captains typically choose at each venue.

slides.title: Weather Watch
slides.body: Rain can reduce overs, changing the game entirely. Overcast skies help swing bowlers. Hot, dry conditions favor batters. Always check the forecast!

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: It's a night game and heavy dew is expected. The toss winner should probably:
slides.explanation: Smart! Dew makes the ball slippery for bowlers in the second innings. Bowl first, then chase with a wet ball that's hard to grip!

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You're now a pitch and weather expert! Use these hidden factors to find edges the casual fan misses.

slides.title: Your AI Coach
slides.body: You have a secret weapon: an AI trained on thousands of cricket matches. Learn to ask the right questions and get winning insights!

slides.title: What the AI Knows
slides.body: Our AI Analyst has studied historical match data, player statistics, head-to-head records, and venue patterns. It's like having a cricket encyclopedia in your pocket.

slides.title: Asking Good Questions
slides.body: Bad: 'Who will win?' Better: 'How does Kohli perform against left-arm pace in T20s?' The more specific your question, the more useful the answer.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Which question will get you the most useful insight?

options.text: What's India's win rate batting first in Australia?

slides.explanation: Perfect! Specific questions get specific answers. Venue + condition + team = actionable intelligence.

slides.title: Research Patterns
slides.body: Before a match, ask about: head-to-head records, recent form, venue history, key player matchups, and injury news. Build a complete picture.

slides.title: Combining Insights
slides.body: The AI gives you data. You make the call. If AI says 'India struggles here' but you know they just fixed their weakness, that's YOUR edge.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: The AI says Pakistan has lost 5 straight games at this venue. You should:

options.text: Check if their team has changed since then

slides.explanation: Exactly! Historical data is a starting point, not the final answer. Teams change. Context matters. Think critically!

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You know how to leverage AI for cricket analysis! Ask smart questions, combine insights, and make informed predictions.

slides.title: Building Your Syndicate
slides.body: In cricket, the best teams have deep squads. Here, your 'syndicate' is your referral network - and they help YOU earn more!

slides.title: What's a Syndicate?
slides.body: Your syndicate is the group of friends you've invited to MOON. Every person who joins using your link becomes part of your network.

slides.title: Earn Per Recruit
slides.body: For every friend who joins through your link, you earn 500 Strategy Points. No limit! 10 friends = 5,000 points. 100 friends = 50,000 points.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: You invite 20 friends and they all join. How many points do you earn?
slides.explanation: Math checks out! 20 friends √ó 500 points = 10,000 points. Your syndicate is a serious points multiplier.

slides.title: Where to Share
slides.body: Share your link in cricket WhatsApp groups, Discord servers, Twitter/X, or directly with friends who love cricket. Cricket fans make the best recruits!

slides.title: Quality Over Quantity
slides.body: Active recruits are worth more in the long run. Invite people who'll actually use the app - they'll stay engaged and boost the community.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: What's the best way to build a strong syndicate?

options.text: Invite cricket fans who'll actually engage

slides.explanation: Exactly! Real cricket fans = real engagement = real value. Build a syndicate of genuine enthusiasts.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You're ready to build your syndicate! Share your link, grow your network, and watch those points multiply.

slides.title: The Daily Grind
slides.body: The best cricketers train every day. The best analysts check in daily too. Small daily actions add up to massive points over time!

slides.title: The Daily Spin
slides.body: Every day at midnight IST, your spin resets. You could win 5 points... or 1,000! It's free points just for showing up.

slides.title: Streak Power
slides.body: Log in every day to build your streak. Consecutive days = bonus rewards. Miss a day? Streak resets. Consistency is key!

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: You've logged in for 6 days straight. What happens if you miss day 7?
slides.explanation: Your streak resets, but you keep your points! Still, try to maintain that streak - consistency gets rewarded.

slides.title: The Optimal Routine
slides.body: Daily checklist: 1) Spin the wheel 2) Check the leaderboard 3) Review today's matches 4) Ask the AI Analyst one question 5) Share with a friend

slides.title: Timing Matters
slides.body: Spin resets at midnight IST. Best time to check matches? Morning for team news, afternoon for final lineups, evening for live action.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: What's the minimum you should do every day?

options.text: Nothing, only trade on match days
Log in and spin - it's free points

slides.explanation: At minimum, log in and spin! It takes 10 seconds and keeps your streak alive. Everything else is bonus.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You know the daily grind! Small daily habits = massive long-term gains. See you tomorrow!

modules.title: Timing the Market
modules.description: When to enter and exit positions

slides.title: Timing the Market
slides.body: Buying at the right time is half the battle. The same prediction can be profitable or not depending on WHEN you enter. Let's master timing!

slides.title: Early Bird Advantage
slides.body: Odds shift as match day approaches. If you spot value early - before the crowd - you get better prices. Early research = better entries.

slides.title: The News Catalyst
slides.body: Big news moves markets fast. Injury announcements, team changes, weather updates - the first to react often gets the best price.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Breaking: Star player is injured! When should you trade?

options.text: Wait a day to see what happens
As soon as possible, before odds adjust

slides.explanation: Speed wins! Once the news spreads, everyone adjusts. The early analyst catches the best prices.

slides.title: Taking Profits
slides.body: You don't have to wait for the match to end! If odds move in your favor, you can exit early and lock in gains. A profit taken is a profit earned.

slides.title: Cutting Losses
slides.body: New information changed your view? It's okay to exit at a small loss rather than ride it to a big loss. Protect your capital!

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: You're up 30% on a position but the match hasn't started. You should:

options.text: Always wait for the match result

slides.explanation: Locking in profit is never wrong! You can take partial profit and let the rest ride, or exit fully. Flexibility is power.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You understand market timing! Enter early, react to news, take profits, and cut losses. Timing is everything!

slides.title: Climbing the Leaderboard
slides.body: Every cricketer wants to be #1 in the rankings. Here, your Strategy Points determine your rank. Let's learn how to climb!

slides.title: Three Leaderboards
slides.body: We track three timeframes: Today, This Week, and All Time. You can dominate daily sprints or play the long game. Why not both?

slides.title: Point Sources
slides.body: Points come from: Daily Spin, Referrals (500 each), Education Modules, Wallet Connection (1000), and Channel Membership (500). Stack them all!

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: What's the fastest way to climb the weekly leaderboard?
slides.explanation: Referrals and education are guaranteed big points! Spin is luck, but referrals and modules are in your control.

slides.title: Top 100 Benefits
slides.body: The Top 100 on the All-Time leaderboard get exclusive benefits at mainnet launch. Early grinders get rewarded. Your position matters!

slides.title: Weekly Resets
slides.body: Weekly leaderboard resets every Monday. This is your chance! A focused week of activity can shoot you to the top.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: You're ranked #150 All-Time. To reach Top 100, you should:

options.text: Focus on daily activities and referrals
Just wait and hope others quit

slides.explanation: It's never too late! Consistent daily effort plus referrals can climb 50 spots faster than you think.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You're ready to compete! Daily grind + referrals + education = leaderboard domination. See you at the top!

slides.title: Spreading Your Field
slides.body: A cricket captain doesn't put all fielders in one spot. Smart analysts don't put all predictions in one match. Let's learn diversification!

slides.title: Why Diversify?
slides.body: One upset can wipe out a concentrated position. But if you're spread across 5 matches and one loses, you still have 4 chances to profit.

slides.title: The 20% Rule
slides.body: Never put more than 20% of your capital in a single prediction. Even if you're super confident. Upsets happen to everyone.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: You have 100 USDT. How much should go into your 'best' prediction?

options.text: All 100 USDT - go big or go home

slides.explanation: 20% max! Even the 'best' predictions fail sometimes. Spread your risk across multiple opportunities.

slides.title: Diversify Across Teams
slides.body: Don't just predict India matches. Look at Pakistan, Australia, England too. More markets = more opportunities = more learning.

slides.title: Diversify Across Time
slides.body: Don't blow your whole budget on day 1 of the tournament. Pace yourself. Later rounds often have better value as you learn more.

slides.title: Strategy Check
slides.question: Tournament starts tomorrow. You should:

options.text: Trade everything on the first match
Save some capital for later rounds
Wait until the final to trade

slides.explanation: Pace yourself! Early matches teach you about form and conditions. Keep capital ready for later opportunities.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You understand diversification! Spread across matches, teams, and time. A protected analyst survives to trade another day.

slides.title: The Airdrop Innings
slides.body: You've been collecting Strategy Points. But what happens when the real game begins? Let's talk about the airdrop and mainnet launch!

slides.title: What's an Airdrop?
slides.body: An airdrop is when projects distribute free tokens to early supporters. Your Strategy Points make you eligible. The more points, the bigger your share!

slides.title: Points ‚Üí Tokens
slides.body: At mainnet launch, Strategy Points convert to real tokens in your connected TON wallet. This is why connecting your wallet matters!

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Why should you connect your wallet before mainnet launch?

options.text: Tokens are sent directly to connected wallets

slides.explanation: Exactly! No wallet = nowhere to receive your tokens. Connect early and verify everything works!

slides.title: Top 100 Exclusive
slides.body: The Top 100 on the All-Time leaderboard get exclusive airdrop bonuses. Your rank literally determines your reward. Every point counts!

slides.title: The Conversion Event
slides.body: When mainnet launches, a snapshot of all points is taken. Your points at that moment determine your airdrop. No last-minute grinding!

slides.title: Final Check
slides.question: To maximize your airdrop, you should:

options.text: Wait until the last day to start
Grind points now and keep wallet connected
Airdrops are random, points don't matter

slides.explanation: Start now, stay consistent, keep that wallet connected! Early grinders always win in crypto.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You understand the endgame! Points today = tokens tomorrow. Keep grinding, stay connected, and get ready for launch!
